pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Gooey PieGooey Pie is a minimalist, opinionated GUI library for Python designed for beginner users of Python.## InstallationYou can install GooeyPie from [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/gooeypie/): pip install gooeypie## How to useA getting started guide, full documentation and examples can be found at https://www.gooeypie.dev/
